Type.BattleDialog: Let us all gather ‘round for a performance.
Even though I can’t see, I’m not afraid.
There are enemies seven steps ahead.
Don’t move too hastily, and be careful. I’ll tell you the directions.
I wonder if Miss Angela enjoyed our performance?
This should allow our ringmaster to bring happiness to more people.
We’ll make it through if we handle things step by step.
I think we’re getting used to this faster than I thought.
You have to look carefully and tell me, okay? I can’t do this alone.
It’s alright. I’m counting on Noah to teach me where to go.
How many people are in front of me… Who just died… I have no idea.
I can’t see… I’m scared. Scared…
Without a friend to tell me the way… How am I going to take another step…?
I hope this could make our performance a marvellous one…
Thanks for watching our show… to the end…
Let us all gather ‘round for a performance.
Even though I can’t see, I’m not afraid.
There are enemies seven steps ahead.
Don’t move too hastily, and be careful. I’ll tell you the directions.
…I can’t hear anything. All I can see is darkness.
